shortDescription.en: 2 main dishes + unlimited injera for 2 people
shortDescription.am: 2 ዋና ምግቦች + ያልተገደበ እንጀራ ለ2 ሰዎች

longDescription.en: Enjoy our famous Doro Wot and Tibs with unlimited freshly made injera. Perfect for sharing! Available Mon-Wed evenings.
longDescription.de: Genießen Sie unser berühmtes Doro Wot und Tibs mit unbegrenzt frisch zubereitetem Injera. Perfekt zum Teilen! Verfügbar Mo-Mi abends.
longDescription.am: የእኛን ዝነኛ ዶሮ ወጥ እና ጥብስ ከያልተገደበ በቅርቡ የተሰራ እንጀራ ጋር ይጣፍጡ። ለመጋራት ፍጹም! ሰኞ-ማክሰኞ ምሽት ይገኛል።

longDescription.en: Experience authentic Ethiopian coffee ceremony with our special popcorn snack and homemade honey bread. Includes three rounds of coffee and traditional incense.
longDescription.de: Erleben Sie eine authentische äthiopische Kaffeezeremonie mit unserem speziellen Popcorn-Snack und hausgemachtem Honigbrot. Enthält drei Runden Kaffee und traditionellen Weihrauch.
longDescription.am: እውነተኛ የኢትዮጵያ ቡና ሥርዓት ከልዩ በተፈጨ ድንች እና ቤት ውስጥ የተሰራ ማር እንጀራ ጋር ይሞክሩ። ሶስት ዙር ቡና እና ባህላዊ ጣና ይጨምራል።

shortDescription.en: Special combo deal for injera lovers.

longDescription.en: Enjoy a variety of dishes with unlimited injera. Perfect for families and groups.
longDescription.de: Genießen Sie eine Vielzahl von Gerichten mit unbegrenztem Injera. Perfekt für Familien und Gruppen.
longDescription.am: ከያልተገደበ እንጀራ ጋር በርካታ ምግቦችን ይጣፍጡ። ለቤተሰቦች እና ቡድኖች ፍጹም!

title.am: አዲስ እንስሳትን የማይመገብ ምግብ ዝርዝር አሁን ይገኛል

shortDescription.am: 10 እውነተኛ የኢትዮጵያ እንስሳትን የማይመገብ ምግቦች ታክለዋል

longDescription.en: We're excited to introduce our new vegan menu featuring traditional fasting foods like Shiro Wot, Misir Wot, and Atakilt Wat. All dishes are prepared with 100% plant-based ingredients following Ethiopian Orthodox fasting traditions.
longDescription.de: Wir freuen uns, unsere neue vegane Speisekarte mit traditionellen Fastengerichten wie Shiro Wot, Misir Wot und Atakilt Wat vorzustellen. Alle Gerichte werden mit 100 % pflanzlichen Zutaten nach äthiopisch-orthodoxen Fastentraditionen zubereitet.
longDescription.am: ሽሮ ወጥ፣ ምስር ወጥ እና አታክልት ወጥ የመሳሰሉ ባህላዊ የጾም ምግቦችን የሚያካትት አዲስ እንስሳትን የማይመገብ ምግብ ዝርዝር ለማስተዋወቅ ተስፋ አድርገናል። ሁሉም ምግቦች ከ100% ተክሎች የተሰሩ ናቸው እና የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ የጾም ልማዶችን ይከተላሉ።

shortDescription.en: Live traditional music while you dine
shortDescription.de: Live traditionelle Musik während Sie speisen

longDescription.en: Starting this June, enjoy live performances of traditional Ethiopian music featuring masinko, krar, and kebero drums every Friday night from 7-10 PM. Special menu featuring regional dishes from Tigray and Gonder available during performances.
longDescription.de: Ab diesem Juni genießen Sie Live-Aufführungen traditioneller äthiopischer Musik mit Masinko, Krar und Kebero-Trommeln jeden Freitagabend von 19-22 Uhr. Spezielle Speisekarte mit regionalen Gerichten aus Tigray und Gonder während der Aufführungen verfügbar.
longDescription.am: ከዚህ ግንቦት ጀምሮ እያንዳንዱን ዓርብ ምሽት ከ7-10 ሰዓት ባህላዊ የኢትዮጵያ ሙዚቃ ከማሲንኮ፣ ክራር እና ከበሮ በቀጥታ ይጫወታል። በሚጫወቱበት ጊዜ ከትግራይ እና ጎንደር የሚመጡ የክልል ምግቦች የሚገኙበት ልዩ የምግብ ዝርዝር።
